tool_description: URL Shortener and Link Management Platform
name: Bitly
title: Bitly

api_list.name: getAppInfo
api_list.description: Return information about an OAuth app.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: The client ID of the app.

api_list.name: getBitlinkClicksNumber
api_list.description: Returns the number of clicks on a single Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

api_list.name: getBitlinkClicksByCountry
api_list.description: Returns metrics about the countries referring click traffic to a single Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

api_list.name: getBitlinkInfo
api_list.description: This is used to return the page title for a given Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: shortUrl
required_parameters.description: shortUrl - refers to one or more Bitlinks. e.g.: http://bit.ly/1RmnUT or http://j.mp/1RmnUT.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

api_list.name: getUserBitlinksClicks
api_list.description: Returns the aggregate number of clicks on all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

api_list.name: createUserBitlink
api_list.description: Saves a long URL as a Bitlink in a user's history, with optional pre-set metadata. (Also returns a short URL for that link.)

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: longUrl
required_parameters.description: The URL to be saved as a Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: private
optional_parameters.description: Indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of this Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: A description of, or note about, this Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: The short domain to use; either bit.ly, j.mp, or bitly.com or a custom short domain. The default for this parameter is the short domain selected by each user in their bitly account settings. Passing a specific domain via this parameter will override the default settings.

api_list.name: checkBitlyProDomain
api_list.description: Query whether a given domain is a valid bitly pro domain. Keep in mind that bitly custom short domains are restricted to less than 15 characters in length.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

api_list.name: createBitlink
api_list.description: Given a long URL, returns a Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: longUrl
required_parameters.description: A long URL to be shortened (example: https://rapidapi.com/).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Returns access token.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The OAuth verification code acquired via OAuth's web authentication protocol.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Your application's bitly client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Your application's bitly client secret.

required_parameters.name: redirectUri
required_parameters.description: The page to which a user was redirected upon successfully authenticating.

api_list.name: getBitlinkReferrersByDomain
api_list.description: Returns metrics about the pages referring click traffic to a single Bitlink, grouped by referring domain.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

api_list.name: getBitlinkMetadata
api_list.description: Returns metadata about a single Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

api_list.name: getBitlinkReferringDomains

required_parameters.name: accessToken

api_list.name: getEncodersNumber
api_list.description: Returns the number of users who have shortened (encoded) a single Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

api_list.name: getLinkEncoders
api_list.description: Returns users who have encoded this long URL (optionally only those in the requesting user's social graph).

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: subaccounts
required_parameters.description: Restrict to this enterprise account and its subaccounts. true or false

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 25 (default=10).

optional_parameters.name: expandUser
optional_parameters.description: Include display names of encoders.

api_list.name: getLinkEncodersByCount
api_list.description: Returns users who have encoded this link (optionally only those in the requesting user's social graph), sorted by the number of clicks on each encoding user's link.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: subaccounts
required_parameters.description: Restrict to this enterprise account and its subaccounts

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 25 (default=10).

optional_parameters.name: expandUser
optional_parameters.description: Include display names of encoders.

api_list.name: getLinkKeywordClicksByDestination
api_list.description: Returns past destination urls for a keyword with the clicks per destination.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

api_list.name: getTrackingDomainClicks
api_list.description: Returns the number of clicks on Bitlinks pointing to the specified tracking domain that have occured in a given time period.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: A tracking domain as returned from /v3/user/tracking_domain_list.

api_list.name: getLongURL
api_list.description: Given a bitly URL or hash (or multiple), returns the target (long) URL.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: shortUrl
required_parameters.description: shortUrl - refers to one or more Bitlinks. e.g.: http://bit.ly/1RmnUT or http://j.mp/1RmnUT.

required_parameters.name: accessToken

optional_parameters.name: units

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

api_list.name: getUser

required_parameters.name: accessToken

api_list.name: getUserBitlinksNumber
api_list.description: Returns the number of Bitlinks created in a given time period by the authenticated user.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: unit

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

api_list.name: getUserBitlinksReferrers
api_list.description: Returns aggregate metrics about the pages referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

api_list.name: getUserBitlinksReferringDomains
api_list.description: Returns aggregate metrics about the domains referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks. If the user is a master account, or is a subaccount with full_reports permission, the user may choose to view the metrics of any account belonging to the master account.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: rollup
optional_parameters.description: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

api_list.name: getUserLinkHistory
api_list.description: Returns entries from a user's link history in reverse chronological order.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: expandClientId
optional_parameters.description: Whether to provide additional information about encoding application. default: false.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Specifying the numbered result at which to start (for pagination).

optional_parameters.name: rootDomain
optional_parameters.description: A root domain to filter on history entries.

optional_parameters.name: campaignId
optional_parameters.description: Filter to return only links for the given campaign_id, can be provided multiple times.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: The Bitlink or Bitlinks to return metadata for (when specified, overrides all other options), can be provided multiple times.

optional_parameters.name: createdAfter
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

optional_parameters.name: private
optional_parameters.description: on, off and both whether to include or exclude private history entries. (on = return only private history entries) default: both.

optional_parameters.name: user
optional_parameters.description: The user for whom to retrieve history entries (if different from authenticated user).

optional_parameters.name: exactDomain
optional_parameters.description: An exact domain to filter on history entries.

optional_parameters.name: deeplinks
optional_parameters.description: on, offor both whether to include or exclude deeplink entries. (on = return only active deeplink history entries) default: off.

optional_parameters.name: createdBefore
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Ad hoc text search string.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Custom keyword to filter on history entries.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Integer in the range 1 to 100 default: 50, specifying the max number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: modifiedAfter
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

optional_parameters.name: archived
optional_parameters.description: on, offor both whether to include or exclude archived history entries. (on = return only archived history entries) default: off.

api_list.name: getUserMostClickedBitlinks
api_list.description: Returns the authenticated user's most-clicked Bitlinks (ordered by number of clicks) in a given time period.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: hour, day, week or month, default: day.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

api_list.name: getUserTrackingDomains
api_list.description: Returns a list of tracking domains a user has configured.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

api_list.name: searchBitlinkByLongURL
api_list.description: This is used to query for a Bitlink based on a long URL.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: One or more long URLs to lookup.

api_list.name: searchUserLinks
api_list.description: This is used to query for a Bitlink shortened by the authenticated user based on a long URL or a Bitlink.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: One or more long URLs to lookup.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: One or more Bitlinks to lookup.

api_list.name: updateBitlink
api_list.description: Changes link metadata in a user's history.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: The Bitlink to be edited.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of this Bitlink.

optional_parameters.name: private
optional_parameters.description: Indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: A description of, or note about, this Bitlink.

api_list.name: updateUser
api_list.description: Update user information.

required_parameters.name: login
required_parameters.description: The bitly login of the user whose info to look up. If not given, the authenticated user will be used.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The OAuth access token for specified user.

required_parameters.name: fullName
required_parameters.description: Set the users full name value. (only available for the authenticated user.)
